grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 嘱託【ショクタク】commission, entrusting with (work), part-time employee, temporary work
嘱望【ショクボウ】(having great) expectation, pinning one's hopes on
委嘱【イショク】commissioning, entrusting (with), request, appointment (to a position)
遺嘱【イショク】dying wish, wish by dying person to be carried out after their death
kun reading compounds: 嘱する【しょくする】to entrust, to send (a message, etc.)
